alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Eastern Lincoln County; Far Northeast Highlands; Guadalupe County; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Northeast Highlands; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; South Central Highlands; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Southwest Chaves County; Upper Tularosa Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 23 at 4:34AM MST until February 23 at 4:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 4 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of central, east central, north central, northeast, and southeast New Mexico. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 4 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
